divs: Sighting DetailsIt was around 9-930pm.I was inside a double decker bus as I was going to pick upfamily at Victoria train station in London. I was in Ladbroke Grove in a 52 busand I was looking out to the sky and I noticed first this really bright lookingstar. Then it started moving randomly or in an erratic way. It disappeared andreappeared about 5 minutes minutes later next to this cylinder shaped craftwhich was slightly shrouded in a myst which to me seemed to reflect theskylight. I was just looking amazed and I did not say anything to people aroundme ( there were only about 7 in the top deck of the bus) as I did not wantpeople to think I am a lunatic. Then after about 10 minutes or so theydisapeared. I woul like to know if anyone has seen this on this day.
trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around June 27th 2002
